changeSet.author: mc
changeSet.comment: Update to new FMB TYP constants names

or.sqlCheck: SELECT DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'INTYG' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'MODEL'

changeSet.author: ef
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO REFERENS (INTYG_ID, REFERENS) SELECT a.INTYGS_ID, a.REFERENCE FROM HANDELSE a INNER JOIN (SELECT INTYGS_ID, MIN(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP FROM HANDELSE WHERE REFERENCE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY INTYGS_ID) b ON a.INTYGS_ID = b.INTYGS_ID AND a.TIMESTAMP = b.TIMESTAMP;

changeSet.author: el
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SIGNATUR SET SIGNATUR_TYP='LEGACY' WHERE SIGNATUR_TYP IS NULL

changeSet.author: el
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SIGNATUR SET SIGNATUR_TYP='LEGACY' WHERE (SIGNATUR_TYP IS NULL OR SIGNATUR_TYP = '')

changeSet.author: marced
